content: sleeping beauty baby blanket by diana mathews for pirate queen designs welcome your new arrival with warm cuddles in a soft blanket that you can adapt to almost any weight yarn the solid center panel knits up quickly and keeps out the winter chill while the cables and lace border add royal elegance gauge in border pattern = 22 x 30 = 4 x 4 in sample using worsted weight yarn your gauge will vary according to your yarn choice size 30 x 30 using worsted weight yarn choosing other yarn weights will affect your final size you will need  800 yards of the yarn of your choice any weight from dk to aran will work the size of your blanket will vary according to your choice of yarn the example was worked in knit picks comfy worsted  1-4 24 or longer circular needles appropriate for yarn chosen the example was worked using two 24 size 6 needles  cable needle  4 stitch markers  a crochet hook depending upon your method of picking up stitches  a tapestry needle for finishing 1 legend k - knit p - purl kfb - knit into the front and back of the next stitch yo - yarn over k2tog - knit two stitches together c2b - slip one stitch onto cable needle and hold behind work knit next stitch and then knit stitch from cable needle pm - place marker m - marker rs - right side of the work ws- wrong side center square cast on 120 stitches using the provisional cast-on of your choice row 1 k1 p1 repeat until end row 2 p1 k1 repeat until end row 3-14 repeat row 1 - 2 six more times row 15 k1 p1 4 times pm k104 pm k1 p1 4 times row 16 ws k1 p1 4 times purl to second marker k1 p1 4 times repeat row 15 - 16 until the stockinette center is an exact square ending on rs finish center square by repeating row 1-2 six more times begin on whichever of the two row fits the pattern using working end of yarn and with rs facing pick up 120 stitches along the adjacent side of square remove waste yarn from provisional cast on to pick up 120 stitches along bottom pick up 120 additional stitches along fourth side for a total of 480 2 stitches on your needle the remaining knitting will be in the round on the perimeter of the completed square you may find it easier to divide the stitches over two or more circular needles spindles border first eyelet section round 1 working in the round *kfb p117 stitches kfb pm p1 in corner stitch repeat from * three more times 122 stitches per side 488 total round 2 eyelet row * yo k2tog until marker yo k1 in corner stitch * repeat from* three more times on other sides round 3 *kfb purl until marker kfb p1 in
